title: RED HOT KDP Niche! Amazon KDP Niche Research for Low Content Coloring Books

tactics.name: spt-score-filter
tactics.description: Prioritize niches with SPT scores above 40% for viable opportunities
source_quotes: this falls under a really hot Niche

tactics.name: vector_graphics_modification
tactics.description: Use free vector graphics (EPS/SVG) from sources like Freepik, modify them with design software to create simple coloring pages.
steps: Download EPS/SVG files from free clip art sources
Use Gravit Designer or similar software to edit graphics
Simplify designs for easy coloring customization
caveats: Complex graphics are harder to customize
source_quotes: Vector EPs and the SVG files so this is perfect I could download these use something like gravic designer

heuristics.name: competition-tradeoff
heuristics.condition: If niche creation requires effort, expect higher competition
source_quotes: the easier it is to create...the more competition there's going to be

heuristics.name: low_review_niche_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with low competition
source_quotes: there's a few other Search terms that people are actually looking for

claims.statement: KDP allows abundant niche opportunities with proper research
source_quotes: there's enough room on KDP for near enough everybody

claims.statement: Amazon KDP allows modification of SVG/EPs files for commercial use
source_quotes: we are allowed to do that because they give us the EPS or the SVG file

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with activity-based content
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines actionable activity with audience needs
source_quotes: there's multiple Search terms for this

niche_patterns.description: Target specific hobbies with low-content customization needs
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines niche interest with easy-to-modify content
source_quotes: things like this would work a lot better than things like this
